explanation: [0-0] An indoor environment with white walls, a stove in the front, a cotton candy machine embedded in the countertop in the middle, and some kitchenware beside the machine. A girl in a black T-shirt is standing in front of the stove. She wears her hair in a ponytail and holds a transparent, long, rectangular plastic container filled with colorful sugar. Behind her are two boys. The taller boy on the left side of the screen wears a blue top with colorful patterns. The shorter boy on the right side of the screen wears a black T-shirt with Mickey Mouse patterns. Between the two boys is a person in a white T-shirt.

[0-8] The girl pours all the sugar from the container onto the center device of the cotton candy machine. Immediately, some white floss-like sugar comes out of the cotton candy machine, followed by green floss-like sugar. The girl puts down the plastic tube in her right hand, picks up a slender bamboo skewer with her left hand, points the skewer at the floating floss-like sugar, and rotates the skewer with both hands. The floss-like sugar wraps around the skewer, gradually forming a large, round cotton candy. While making the cotton candy, the girl looks forward from time to time. The boy in the black T-shirt covers his forehead with his left hand and stares at the girl's actions, and the other boy also stares at her actions.

[8-16] After getting a large green cotton candy, the girl leaves from the left side of the screen. The boy in the black T-shirt walks to the cotton candy machine, uses the bamboo skewer to pick up the remaining sugar floss, then picks up a metal tool with his right hand to scoop some white sugar and pours it into the cotton candy machine. A lot of white floss-like sugar appears in the cotton candy machine immediately. He rotates the bamboo skewer with both hands and quickly wraps it into a small, white, ball-shaped cotton candy, and then leaves from the left side of the screen.
